ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Double Star 2 Spacecraft Flux Gate Magnetometer (FGM) Summary Parameters Data
ResourceHeader.Description: The Double Star 2 Flux Gate Magnetometer (FGM) summary parameter data set contains various parameters in GSE coordinates at 60 s resolution. These parameters include universal time, the instrument status, the magnetic field vector in GSE coordinates, and the magnetic field variances. These parameters are available through Double Star Science Data Centre The Data Ring with restricted access.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Dr. Tielong Zhang, European Space Agency/International

InformationURL.Name: Double Star 2 Flux Gate Magnetometer (FGM)

AccessURL.Description: Double Star Data Center Hub web page. This page provides access to other sites with the prime parameter and summary parameter data from the Double Star mission.

NumericalData.ProviderResourceName: Double Star 2 Flux Gate Magnetometer (FGM) Summary Parameters Data

TimeSpan.Note: Time format in data files is: day, month, year hour, min, seconds. Ex: '01-Jan-1981 00:00:00.000'

Parameter.Name: Double Star 2 FGM Universal Time Summary Parameter
Parameter.Description: Universal Time in data cell: day, month, year hour, min, seconds. Ex: '01-Jan-1981 00:00:00.000'. The time is an interval centered time tag rounded to nearest msecond.

Parameter.Name: Double Star 2 FGM Half Interval Summary Parameter
Parameter.Description: Double Star 2 FGM half the mean separation between time tags, averaged over the file.

Parameter.Name: Double Star 2 FGM Status Summary Parameter
Parameter.Description: Double Star 2 FGM status at 60 s resolution.

Parameter.Name: Double Star 2 FGM DC Magnetic Field Vector Summary Parameter
Parameter.Description: Double Star 2 FGM magnetic field vectors at 60 s resolution in GSE Coordinates in units of nT.

Parameter.Name: Double Star 2 FGM Magnetic Variance Summed Summary Parameter
Parameter.Description: Double Star 2 FGM normalised magnetic variance including summed component variances at 60 s resolutionT.

Parameter.Name: Double Star 2 FGM Magnetic Variance of the Magnitude Summary Parameter
Parameter.Description: Double Star 2 FGM magnetic variance of the magnitude at 60 s resolution.
